Nos Services Principaux

Complete Logistics Services

GKS Logistics offers a complete range of transport and logistics solutions tailored to your specific needs

Air Freight

At GKS Logistics, your air shipments are faster, safer and more cost-effective. We put our expertise and our global network at your service for flawless air logistics.

  • Simplicity and reliability of our network
  • Ultra-fast shipping with wide international coverage
  • Consolidation or solo charter with deadline respect
  • Worldwide assistance regardless of incoterms
90% Consolidation & Charter
48h Global coverage
Request a Quote

Sea Freight FCL & LCL

Economical sea transport for full container loads (FCL) and consolidated shipping (LCL). Solutions adapted for all cargo volumes with complete end-to-end management.

  • 20' & 40' FCL containers
  • LCL consolidation service
  • Customs clearance included
  • Door-to-door delivery
5000+ Containers/year
100% Secured
Request a Quote

Land Freight

Thanks to our expertise and our regional network in West Africa, we offer secure, fast road transport services meeting the requirements of our clients; ensuring fast and efficient delivery of goods.

  • Heavy or bulky shipment capability
  • Affordable costs with guaranteed reliability
  • Respect for transit times
  • Complete transport insurance coverage
8 Secure service
24/7 Fast and efficient
Request a Quote

Warehousing

We offer modern, secure and strategic warehousing solutions to optimize your inventory management and supply chain. Our adapted infrastructure and expertise guarantee efficient and cost-effective management of your goods, whether short or long-term storage.

  • 24/7 monitored warehouse with cameras and strict access control
  • Optimized storage conditions
  • Warehouse located at the airport
  • Real-time tracking and detailed movement reports
24/7 Maximum security
100% Complete traceability
Request a Quote

Distribution

With GKS Logistics, enjoy our distribution services throughout Bamako and the sub-region. Benefit from an efficient, secure and economical parcel distribution service adapted to your professional and personal needs.

  • Efficient and secure delivery
  • Local, regional and international coverage
  • Express and standard options
  • Service tailored to your professional and personal needs
Multi Regional coverage
Ã‰co Economical service
Request a Quote

Air Consolidation

Thanks to our SME logistics solution, enjoy an economical, fast, and secure service for your shipments between Paris-Bamako, Bamako-Paris and Dubai-Bamako.

  • Transport cost optimization
  • Regular shipments from Paris and Dubai to Bamako
  • Customs handling in Bamako
  • Complete security and traceability
PME SME Logistics
3 Routes Paris/Dubai/Bamako

Your Trusted Logistics Partner

Recognized Expertise

Over 5 years of experience in international logistics with in-depth knowledge of African, European and American markets.

Personalized services adapted to your industry and specific needs, from e-commerce to heavy industry.

Full cargo insurance, secure warehouses and rigorous procedures to protect your goods.
